SEARCH
Package BE

Class Inquiry

java.lang.Object
BE.Inquiry
public class Inquiry extends Object
Represents an inquiry within a camp, typically initiated by a user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Inquiry(User sender, String message, String camp)
    Constructs an Inquiry object with sender, message, and camp.
